TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Matrix3D extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 表示 4 x 4 矩陣，用於 3-D 空間中的轉換。

span.span: Represents a 4 x 4 matrix used for transformations in 3-D space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有下列資料列向量語法： has the following row-vector syntax: ||||| |-|-|-|-| ||||| ||||| ||||| ||||| 請注意，第四個資料行也是可存取的因為矩陣可讓開發人員代表仿射，以及非仿射轉換。Note that because the fourth column is also accessible, the matrix allows developers to represent affine as well as non-affine transforms. 矩陣可以附加或其他矩陣的前面加上。Matrices can be appended or prepended to other matrices. 將矩陣的附加到矩陣 B 表示轉換由 B 和 a:Appending matrix A to matrix B denotes a transformation by B and then by A: ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: Matrix to append.

summary.span: 在目前的矩陣之後加上指定的矩陣。

span.span: Appends a specified matrix to the current matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 矩陣可以附加或其他矩陣的前面加上。Matrices can be appended or prepended to other matrices. 將矩陣的附加到矩陣 B 表示轉換由 B 和 a:Appending matrix A to matrix B denotes a transformation by B and then by A: ``` A(B(...)) ``` 之前 A 到 B 表示轉換由 A 和 b:Prepending A to B denotes a transformation by A and then by B: ``` B(A(...)) ``` 若要轉換點 P 由 A 和 B，加上 B a:To transform point P by A and then by B, append B to A: ``` C = A.Append(B); P' = C.Transform(P); ```

summary.span: 將 結構變更為單位 。

span.span: Changes a structure into an identity .

value.span: 單位 Matrix3D。

span.span: The identity Matrix3D.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [身分識別矩陣，所有係數都是 0，除非 [1，1] [2，2] [3，3] [4，4] 的係數，都會設定為 1。In an identity matrix, all coefficients are 0 except the [1,1][2,2][3,3][4,4] coefficients, which are set to 1. 當它套用到端點時，它們是不變，是特殊的身分識別矩陣。The identity matrix is special in that when it is applied to vertices, they are unchanged. 身分識別矩陣用於修改頂點的值，以建立旋轉、 翻譯以及可以表示的 4x4 矩陣的其他任何轉換的矩陣做為起點。The identity matrix is used as the starting point for matrices that modify vertex values to create rotations, translations, and any other transformations that can be represented by a 4x4 matrix.

exception.span: 如果矩陣不能反轉，則會擲回 InvalidOperationException。

span.span: Throws InvalidOperationException if the matrix is not invertible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [身分識別矩陣，所有係數都是 0，除非 [1，1] [2，2] [3，3] [4，4] 的係數，都會設定為 1。In an identity matrix, all coefficients are 0 except the [1,1][2,2][3,3][4,4] coefficients, which are set to 1. 當它套用到端點時，它們是不變，是特殊的身分識別矩陣。The identity matrix is special in that when it is applied to vertices, they are unchanged. 身分識別矩陣用於修改頂點的值，以建立旋轉、 翻譯以及可以表示的 4x4 矩陣的其他任何轉換的矩陣做為起點。The identity matrix is used as the starting point for matrices that modify vertex values to create rotations, translations, and any other transformations that can be represented by a 4x4 matrix.

summary.span: 比較兩個 執行個體是否完全相等。

span.span: Compares two instances for exact equality.

returns.span: ，表示兩個矩陣執行個體 (Instance) 是否相等。

span.span: that indicates whether the two matrix instances are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，雙精度浮點數值可以取得時，操作時發生錯誤，以便在邏輯上相等的兩個值之間進行精確比較可能會失敗。Note that double values can acquire error when operated upon, so that an exact comparison between two values that are logically equal may fail. 此外，使用此等號比較運算子，Double.NaN 不等於本身。Furthermore, using this equality operator, Double.NaN is not equal to itself.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetIdentity() cil managed

summary.span: 將這個 結構變更為單位矩陣。

span.span: Changes this structure into an identity matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [身分識別矩陣，所有係數都是 0，除非 [1，1] [2，2] [3，3] [4，4] 的係數，都會設定為 1。In an identity matrix, all coefficients are 0 except the [1,1][2,2][3,3][4,4] coefficients, which are set to 1. 當它套用到端點時，它們是不變，是特殊的身分識別矩陣。The identity matrix is special in that when it is applied to vertices, they are unchanged. 身分識別矩陣用於修改頂點的值，以建立旋轉、 翻譯以及可以表示的 4x4 矩陣的其他任何轉換的矩陣做為起點。The identity matrix is used as the starting point for matrices that modify vertex values to create rotations, translations, and any other transformations that can be represented by a 4x4 matrix.
